reviews.productTitle: Cloudy Bay in Wall Dimmer Switch for LED Light/CFL/Incandescent,3-Way Single Pole Dimmable Slide,600 Watt max,Cover Plate Included
reviews.text: This dimmer would barely dim. I am using standard incandescent 40 watt light bulbs. When I would adjust the dimmer to medium or low, it would flicker terribly. I made sure I followed all the directions properly. I even took it out and reinstalled it just to make sure. No matter what I tried, the dimmer would barely dim, and it would flicker badly.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 31, 2025
reviews.title: Dimmer barely dimmed. Bulbs flickered on low but hardly any dimming.

reviews.title: Flickering and buzzing

reviews.productTitle: Cloudy Bay in Wall Dimmer Switch for LED Light/CFL/Incandescent,3-Way Single Pole Dimmable Slide,600 Watt max,Cover Plate Included
reviews.text: I’ve had this light switch installed for the last couples weeks and I am very happy with this purchase, especially due to its affordability. I have a very bright LED light in my room, no blinds/curtains and live in a foresty area, so at night when it’s pitch black outside my light feels extremely bright. I wanted to be able to turn it down and found this light switch. My dad installed it in minutes and have had 0 issues. The light comes right on, dims perfectly, and is a nice simple design.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2025
reviews.title: Works perfect for me!

reviews.productTitle: Cloudy Bay in Wall Dimmer Switch for LED Light/CFL/Incandescent,3-Way Single Pole Dimmable Slide,600 Watt max,Cover Plate Included
reviews.text: I bought this to replace a dimmer that had a smaller dimmer slide switch that was vertical. We have another one like this with a horizontal slide and it is easier to use. This switch seems nice, has a good price for $13 and lots of good reviews. It has a wheel adjustment on the inside to help adjust the lowest dimmer setting, similar to the previously installed one. I adjusted it per the instructions and it worked upon install, but now there is a second or two delay from clicking the switch on to when the light actually turns on.(video) I'll go back and try to adjust again, so it turns on with the lowest dimmer, but I may need to increase the brightness for this switch to work. It is a fine adjustment to try and have the lowest dimmer setting and where the switch turns the light on. Not sure if it is my adjustment or the switch. Update: It did not at first, but has started to cause flickering in the lights. This did not happen with the prior dimmer switch. Due to the flickering combined with the inability to set a low dimming starting point, I would likely not purchase this again.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2025
reviews.title: Good, but....

reviews.productTitle: Cloudy Bay in Wall Dimmer Switch for LED Light/CFL/Incandescent,3-Way Single Pole Dimmable Slide,600 Watt max,Cover Plate Included

reviews.productTitle: Cloudy Bay in Wall Dimmer Switch for LED Light/CFL/Incandescent,3-Way Single Pole Dimmable Slide,600 Watt max,Cover Plate Included
reviews.text: I only needed a regular dimmer (not smart) for my hallway light. Unfortunately, this dimmer switch was not good at all. There was a constant buzzing/humming sound coming from it. No matter how much I adjusted the dial, the lights would flicker every now and then. Even if I find a sweet spot, a few minutes later, it will flicker again. Would not recommend.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2024
reviews.title: Flickering and Buzzing

reviews.productTitle: Cloudy Bay in Wall Dimmer Switch for LED Light/CFL/Incandescent,3-Way Single Pole Dimmable Slide,600 Watt max,Cover Plate Included
reviews.text: I installed it to replace the rotary type of dimmer switch. The rotary type seems quite lousy. I bought four and I had to return three. This type of dimmer switch seems to be more reliable. No more fiddling around with the rotary switch. I hate pushing that switch to turn the light off and on. This one works just like a regular light switch except you can change the amount of light. I’m happy.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2024
reviews.title: It works! Everybody’s happy!

Typically I would not leave a review but this one is a replacement for the same one that failed the same way! I gave up and ordered a Lutron for 3 times as much but I know it won’t fail in 9 months!

reviews.productTitle: Cloudy Bay in Wall Dimmer Switch for LED Light/CFL/Incandescent,3-Way Single Pole Dimmable Slide,600 Watt max,Cover Plate Included
reviews.text: It took a little bit to match up wires from an existing 3 way standard on off switch to this switch when we recently has a set of 8 can-less 6" LED ceiling lights installed. But, it was more than reasonable. My only issue has to do with the dimming; mind you the manual *did* describe the little knob for adjusting brightness which did help. However, i still AK experiencing the brightness go from low to high and they slightly less than high brightness. Weird. Tuning the knob did help reduce this, but it did not go away. FYI. Not sure if the LEDs are the problem or because there is another switch which is a standard on/off (and not matching switch)....but yeah. Video is the best I could get it.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2024
reviews.title: Easy to install but dimming issues
